nodes.text: Singe was a male Rodian who worked as a smuggler during the Cold War. While on Coruscant, he frequented Mariyk's cantina in Coruscant's Senate Commercial District. He sold powerful weapons and armor to other smugglers for a price.
Singe appears in BioWare's 2011 MMORPG, Star Wars: The Old Republic, as a PvP vendor for smugglers on Coruscant.
